import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Store, select } from '@ngrx/store'; import { ElementList } from 'app/interfaces/bootstrap'; import { State } from 'app/State/compareReducer'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { savePlayers } from '../../State/compareActions'; @Component({ selector: 'app-compare', templateUrl: './compare.component.html', styleUrls: ['./compare.component.scss'], }) export class CompareComponent { elements!: State; constructor(private store: Store<{ players: State }>) { } ngOnInit() { this.store.select('players').subscribe(players => { console.log("players", players); this.elements = players; console.log("this.elements", this.elements); }); } }
